featured.text: They have found that certain parts of the brain are responsible for learning, memory, and language.
The pilot is responsible for not only the safety of the ship but also the protection of the port and the marine environment.

It will be made of timber as an ecological symbol of “the right to a dignified life on a protected Earth,” said architects Normier, Henni and Lelievre, who were also responsible for the Europe section at the Seville exhibition.
Studies show that asking children to do house _____, such as taking out the trash or doing the dishes, helps them grow into responsible adults.

other.text: what happens on Earth, and are responsible for quite a few legends, and that the ancient Greek and Roman gods, __(34)__ the fairies and dwarfs in many classical tales, were in fact “space people” living here.

Their simple design is responsible for many foot injuries.
But the captain of a ship is responsible for guiding the vessel until they hit a port, waiting to enter the harbor.

definition.en_def: Having an obligation to do something or having control over or care for someone.
definition.example: She is responsible for managing the team's projects.
